subject: Married
text:
We've had our happy wedding day.
Our solemn vow's we've said. The past
We leave behind us and the future lies ahead
….Side by side we'll face it full of faith and
confidence-Trusting in our love and in the
hand of Providence.

To the promises we've made we'll be for
ever true. Sharing every happiness and all our
problems too. Nothing can divide us now or
break the sacred tie. We'll face the world and
take what comes-Together, you and I.
